short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirects Wikipedia to the mobile version.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The mobile version of Wikipedia looks beautiful. This extension automatically redirects Wikipedia to the mobile version. It also sets the font to "San Fransisco" for macOS users.
